step1.title: Choose Your Game
step1.description: Select from our wide variety of lottery games with different prize pools and odds

step2.title: Buy Your Ticket
step2.description: Purchase tickets securely with multiple payment options and instant confirmation

step3.title: Wait for Results
step3.description: Watch live draws and get notified instantly when results are announced

step4.description: Collect your winnings quickly and securely through our verified payment system

dashboard.createGameDescription: Launch a new marketing lottery to promote your products and engage customers.
dashboard.viewGamesDescription: Browse all available lottery games and participate in exciting promotions.
dashboard.myTicketsDescription: View all your lottery tickets and track your participation history.

games.noGamesDescription: Try adjusting your search or filters, or check back later for new lottery games!
